articles.title: YEEZY GAP Engineered by Balenciaga: Release Date, Lookbook - Highsnobiety
articles.description: YEEZY GAP Engineered by Balenciaga was drops a day after Kanye's DONDA 2 listening party on February 23. Here's everything about the drop.
articles.content:
After months of anticipation, we're finally set to see a bigger release from Kanye West's YEEZY GAP collaboration.
Last year, we saw a slow rollout that featured the signature Round Jacket in blue, … [+2683 chars]
